page.title: 06PEOPLE AND OCCUPATIONS
page.content: The survey area has a remarkably homogeneous life style, due mainly to its location relative to London, but also to the local landscape and communications. Local industrial employment is minimal, so most working inhabitants commute to London or the suburbs. Occupations are varied, but nevertheless mainly belong to the higher social economic groups, Airline pilots, people from television, film or the theatre, and the upper echelons of the London business community figure prominenty amongst the local inhabitants. There is a small farming community around Hedgerley.
